001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regimes;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Strategy;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.EstimationFunction;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.NeuralNetwork;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.NeuralNetworks;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Optimizer;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Regime;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.TrainableFunction;
012
013/**
014 * A {@link Regime} decorator that dumps the internal node activations of a
015 * {@link NeuralNetwork} before and/or after each training epoch.
016 *
017 * <p>This regime is typically used for debugging and inspection. It wraps
018 * another regime, delegates the actual training to it, and uses
019 * {@link NeuralNetworks#dump(NeuralNetwork, boolean)} to output the state of
020 * the network. The dump can optionally include input nodes.</p>
021 *
022 * <h3>Behavior</h3>
023 * <ul>
024 *   <li>If {@code firstTime} is true, the network is dumped once before the
025 *   first training step.</li>
026 *   <li>The network is always dumped after each delegated training epoch.</li>
027 *   <li>If {@code includeInputs} is true, input node values are included in the
028 *   dump; otherwise only hidden and output nodes are dumped.</li>
029 * </ul>
030 *
031 * @see NeuralNetworks#dump(NeuralNetwork, boolean)
032 * @see DelegatedRegime
033 */
034@Strategy(Strategy.Role.CONCRETE)
035public class DumpNodesRegime extends DelegatedRegime {
036
037    /**
038     * The hyperparameter name to dump first time
039     */
040    public static final String HP_DUMP_FIRST_TIME = "dumpFirstTime";
041    /**
042     * The hyperparameter name to dump inputs
043     */
044    public static final String HP_DUMP_INPUTS = "dumpInputs";
045
046    /**
047     * Creates a new regime that dumps node values of the given network during training.
048     *
049     * @param regime        the underlying regime to delegate training to
050     * @param firstTime     if true, the network is dumped once before training begins
051     * @param includeInputs if true, input nodes are included in the dump
052     */
053    public DumpNodesRegime(Regime regime, boolean firstTime, boolean includeInputs) {
054        super(regime);
055        setHyperparameter(HP_DUMP_FIRST_TIME, firstTime);
056        setHyperparameter(HP_DUMP_INPUTS, includeInputs);
057    }
058
059    /**
060     * Returns whether the network will be dumped once before training starts.
061     *
062     * @return {@code true} if the network is dumped before the first epoch, otherwise {@code false}
063     */
064    public boolean isFirstTime() {
065        return getHyperparameter(HP_DUMP_FIRST_TIME, Boolean.class);
066    }
067
068    /**
069     * Sets whether the network should be dumped before training begins.
070     *
071     * @param firstTime {@code true} to dump before the first epoch, {@code false} otherwise
072     */
073    public void setFirstTime(boolean firstTime) {
074        setHyperparameter(HP_DUMP_FIRST_TIME, firstTime);
075    }
076
077    /**
078     * Returns whether input nodes are included in the dump.
079     *
080     * @return {@code true} if input nodes are included, {@code false} otherwise
081     */
082    public boolean isIncludeInputs() {
083        return getHyperparameter(HP_DUMP_INPUTS, Boolean.class);
084    }
085
086    /**
087     * Sets whether to include input nodes in the dump.
088     *
089     * @param includeInputs {@code true} to include input nodes, {@code false} otherwise
090     */
091    public void setIncludeInputs(boolean includeInputs) {
092        setHyperparameter(HP_DUMP_INPUTS, includeInputs);
093    }
094
095    /**
096     * Trains the given estimation function with the wrapped regime and dumps the
097     * network nodes before and/or after training.
098     * <p>
099     * If the estimation function is a {@link NeuralNetwork}, its nodes are
100     * printed using {@link NeuralNetworks#dump(NeuralNetwork, boolean)}.
101     * </p>
102     *
103     * @param estimationFunction the model to train (only {@link NeuralNetwork} is dumped)
104     * @param trainingSet        the dataset to train on
105     * @param objective          the objective (loss) function
106     * @param optimizer          the optimizer to apply updates
107     * @param <E>                the type of estimation function
108     */
109    @Override
110    public <E extends TrainableFunction<N>, N extends Number> void train(E estimationFunction, DataSet<N> trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction<N> objective, Optimizer<? super E, N> optimizer) {
111        train(estimationFunction, trainingSet, objective, optimizer, (Integer) null);
112    }
113
114    @Override
115    public <E extends TrainableFunction<N>, N extends Number> void train(E estimationFunction, DataSet<N> trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction<N> objective, Optimizer<? super E, N> optimizer, int step) {
116        train(estimationFunction, trainingSet, objective, optimizer, (Integer) step);
117    }
118
119    private <E extends TrainableFunction<N>, N extends Number> void train(E estimationFunction, DataSet<N> trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction<N> objective, Optimizer<? super E, N> optimizer, Integer step) {
120        if (isFirstTime()) {
121            dumpNodes(estimationFunction);
122        }
123        if (step == null) {
124            regime.train(estimationFunction, trainingSet, objective, optimizer);
125        } else {
126            regime.train(estimationFunction, trainingSet, objective, optimizer, step);
127        }
128        dumpNodes(estimationFunction);
129    }
130
131    private <E extends EstimationFunction<N>, N extends Number> void dumpNodes(E estimationFunction) {
132        if (estimationFunction instanceof NeuralNetwork neuralNetwork) {
133            NeuralNetworks.dump(neuralNetwork, isIncludeInputs());
134        }
135    }
136}
